entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to Download Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore Libraries in Visual Studio 2022 #34784
  • EF Core 8.0 fails choosing the right constructor when creating entities from DB having multiple constructors #34783
  • Problems .Net8 Microsoft.EntityframeworkCore.Design 8.0.8 with ReportViewerCore.NETCore 15.1.19 or upper #34782

Closed

  • Getting error "System.InvalidOperationException: Cannot scaffold C# literals of type 'System.Reflection.NullabilityInfoContext" in EF Core 8.0.4/8.0.8 #34698

PullRequests

Updated

  • Make dotnet-ef build properly on Linux. #34781
  • Fix: Value cannot be null parameter name key #34730
    waiting-for-response
